reviewText: I watched the original Mr. Bean growing up and came across these on Netflix. My 4 year old daughter became hooked. Most are pretty appropriate for all ages. Yes, the menu may only let you play 2 episodes at a time, but it's not a huge issue for me. We own the whole animated series and watch them once a week or more.

my 4 yr old loves mr bean but cant play this dvd by herself, the menu is too complicated, what ever happened to "play all" that actually plays more than 2 episodes at a time. also, there are only 1o episodes on this dvd. didn't know mr bean was is such high demand that they could get away with that---  not like spongebob
